feature_model.name: Ubuntu1204_Zoom

meta.data: Feature model representing paths to accessibility options associated with Zoom in Ubuntu12.04 Operating System.
The University Of Yaounde I - Cameroun

feature_model.feature_tree: :r RootFeatures(_r0) :o UniversalAccess1(_r1) :o Typing1(_r2) :o KeyboardSetting(_r3) :o Shortcuts(_r4) :o UniversalAccess2(_r5) :o TurnZoomOnOrOff(_r6) :o Alt_Super_plus8(_r7) :o ZoomIn(_r8) :o Alt_Super_plusEqual(_r9) :o ZoomOut(_r10) :o Alt_Super_plusMinus(_r11)
